name: @nickgdev/couch-gag-common-lib
description: common utils and types for couch-gag-server & couch-gag-website
author: NickGDev

scripts.clean: yarn clean:deps && yarn clean:styles && yarn clean:lib
scripts.post-build: cp README.md lib/ && cp public/styles/heller.css lib/
scripts.prepare-publish: echo "cleaning..." && yarn clean && echo "installing clean deps..." && yarn && echo "formatting..." && yarn fmt && echo "running src/scripts/theme/heller-color-tokenizer.js" && yarn build:styles && echo "building..." && yarn build && echo "copying readme..." && yarn post-build && echo "done!"
